name: places/ChIJ7cEJYJ1YwokR32mqt-KDruQ
formattedAddress: 146 W 95th St # 1A, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 146 W 95th St # 1A, New York, NY 10025-6610, USA

originalText.text: Dr Nesselson was my daughters pediatrician starting at 8 months old. She is nearly 10 now. What i learned from him i did with all of my children. The impact this man has had on our family is beyond words. We moved out of state from NY and even traveled back and forth to see him but unfortunately the travel became too  much. I have never found another doctor like him. By the time my daughter was 8 months old she had 4 pediatricians because not one of them would take my or my husbands medical history into consideration, and the problems I was noticing with my daughter -gastro issues, rashes, trouble breastfeeding - were just fluffed off. But not by Dr Nesselson. He is truly a remarkable pediatrician and whomever he treats are truly blessed.

originalText.text: The kindest, most compassionate, and super knowledgeable doctor I have ever met. He loves his patients and cares deeply about entire families. It's a true blessing we were recommended to him and I can't thank him enough for his amazing expertise. He spends hours making sure our children are healthy and well. Always available to his patients and always on top of things. Brilliant mind and brilliant human being

originalText.text: 5 STAR is an absolute here!  After searching for two plus years for a pediatrician that was not only a doctor by degrees and having a practice for so many plus years,  but a doctor that goes above and beyond to give you valuable time and his thorough expertise with every Q and A that was presented, was exactly what I had experienced with our first visit.  This was the most thorough evaluation that we have ever gotten with our 13 year old.  I can't express enough into words how relieved and happy we are with our NEW doctor.  We have fallen into very good hands and the trip was worth it.  Thank you so much Dr. Nesselson for your true love and devotion in the the medical field.

originalText.text: I can't say enough amazing things about Dr. Nesselson. He directed us in a path that led us to find the cause of my child's difficulty focusing, which we were able to help without an ounce of medication. We would not be in the good place we are today if it wasn't for him. He really assesses and cares for the whole child in the most thorough way.
